text: Christian Silfver (born August 19, 1991) is a Finnish ice hockey defenceman. He is currently playing with SønderjyskE Ishockey in the Danish Metal Ligaen. Silfver made his SM-liiga debut playing with HIFK during the 2011–12 SM-liiga season. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Finnish ice hockey defencemen Category:HIFK (ice hockey) players Category:Lahti Pelicans players
title: Christian Silfver
